about_the_game:
Brutal Force is a frantic top-down shooter.
The levels are randomly placed in the world, changing your experience each play through.
This game has different missions to be made and Beat Em Up style game when you drop the weapon.

  • Beat em Up style game when you drop the weapon.
  • Randomly generated Levels (roguelike )
  • Randomly generated items and enemies
  • Permadeath
  • Each weapon type has a unique power attack including ranged, and weapons
  • Giant bosses

  • Full Joystick Support

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux + SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux + SteamOS
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
